revision.text:
<!--항공사_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Airline
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = IATA | ontologyProperty = iataLocationIdentifier }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = ICAO | ontologyProperty = icaoLocationIdentifier }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = Callsign | ontologyProperty = callSign }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 허브공항 | ontologyProperty = hubAirport }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 준허브 | ontologyProperty = hubAirport }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 거점도시 | ontologyProperty = targetAirport }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 항공동맹 | ontologyProperty = alliance }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 본사 | ontologyProperty = headquarter }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 항공사 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 영어명 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 현지명 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 창립일 | ontologyProperty = formationDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 운항개시일 | ontologyProperty = openingDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 운항중단일 | ontologyProperty = closingDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 모기업 | ontologyProperty = parentCompany }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 웹사이트 | ontologyProperty = foaf:homepage }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 웹사이트 | ontologyProperty = foaf:homepage }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 영업이익 | ontologyProperty = operatingIncome | unit = Currency }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 순이익 | ontologyProperty = netIncome | unit = Currency }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 총자산 | ontologyProperty = assets | unit = Currency }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 자회사 | ontologyProperty = subsidiary }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 매출액 | ontologyProperty = revenue | unit = Currency }}
end}}

<!-- Not Yet Mapping
| 상용고객 우대제도 = 
| VIP 라운지 = 
| 보유 항공기 수 = 
| 취항지 수 = 
| 슬로건 =
| 핵심 인물 = 
| 자기자본 = 
-->
